definition: scenes of springtime/the radiance of spring/(fig.) a sight of sth sexy or erotic/an indication of a love affair
spring sunshine emerges to bring the world alive (idiom)/to give a glimpse of sth intimate (e.g. one's underwear)

sentences.english: A streak of spring light is whitening the curtain, across my dream.

sentences.english: Watching Chang Chen stare off into the falls made me think of Happy Together.
